archimate:Grouping.name: Standards Referenced by SOGP Topics
archimate:Grouping.documentation:
A Standard Of Good Practice (SOGP) Topic may reference no standard at all, or it may reference 1 or even several other standards.
This grouping shows:
1. The possible standards which may be referenced by an SOGP Topic. 2. The standards which the ESA team has decided are In Scope for our modelling work.
